titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide civil service retirement credit to a Federal employee for any period of service performed with the American Red Cross abroad during a period of war.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Provides civil service retirement credit to a Federal employee who leaves his or her position to serve with the American Red Cross abroad during a period of war if such employee subsequently returns to Federal employment.
